title: My phone went to no service out of the Blu I can't text or call, it says to turn areomode off
content: Phone went to no service out of the blue, We reset the phone checked the sim it's fine, tried the *#*#4736#*#*, areoplane mode, still comes up when trying to make a call, I'm a frontline worker and I have two kids  and at home please help.  My phone is critical.I took the phone to a phone tech and even he has no idea and had never seen this before, and we tried and retried trouble shooting.
